newsItems.title: Sentinel's Dilemma Now Available!
newsItems.content:
The first book in **The Sentinel Trilogy** is now available! Join the journey as our protagonist faces impossible choices between duty and conscience.

[Get it on Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0FJW14Z9H).

newsItems.title: The Trilogy Continues
newsItems.content:
The epic follow-ups to **The Sentinel Trilogy** will test everything our characters hold dear.

### Upcoming Releases:

- **Sentinel's Return** - Coming 2026
- **Sentinel's Crisis** - Coming 2027

Stay tuned for more updates and exclusive previews!
